act_summary: The section regulates the issuance of depository receipts by a company, which must be incorporated under this Act or any previous company law. It specifies that such issuances can only occur in foreign countries and require specific conditions to be met. The rules for issuing these receipts are detailed in the Companies (Issue of Global Depository Receipts) Rules, 2014, as well as SEBI's Frameworks dated October 10, 2019, and November 28, 2019.
